Obsoleted in JDK14

removed.name: ShenandoahAllocationStallThreshold
removed.description: When allocation tracing is enabled, the allocation stalls larger than this threshold would be reported as warnings. Time is in microseconds.

removed.name: ShenandoahAllocationTrace
removed.description: Trace allocation latencies and stalls. Can be expensive when lots of allocations happen, and may introduce scalability bottlenecks.

removed.name: ShenandoahAllowMixedAllocs
removed.description: Allow mixing mutator and collector allocations in a single region

removed.name: ShenandoahAlwaysPreTouch
removed.description: Pre-touch heap memory, overrides global AlwaysPreTouch

removed.name: ShenandoahCommonGCStateLoads
removed.description: Enable commonming for GC state loads in generated code.

removed.name: ShenandoahConcurrentScanCodeRoots
removed.description: Scan code roots concurrently, instead of during a pause

removed.name: ShenandoahEvacAssist
removed.description: How many objects to evacuate on LRB assist path. Use zero to disable.

removed.name: ShenandoahFreeThreshold
removed.description: Set the percentage of free heap at which a GC cycle is started. Does not apply to all heuristics.

removed.name: ShenandoahHeapRegionSize
removed.description: Size of the Shenandoah regions. Set to zero to detect automatically.

removed.name: ShenandoahKeepAliveBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off keep alive barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMaxGap
removed.description: If GC is currently running in merged update-refs mode this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to separate update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative to duration(marking)+duration(update-refs).

removed.name: ShenandoahMergeUpdateRefsMinGap
removed.description: If GC is currently running in separate update-refs mode this numbers gives the threshold when to switch to merged update-refs mode. Number is percentage relative toduration(marking)+duration(update-refs).

removed.name: ShenandoahOptimizeInstanceFinals
removed.description: Optimize barriers on final instance fields.Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI code that manipulates final fields.

removed.name: ShenandoahOptimizeStableFinals
removed.description: Optimize barriers on stable fields.Turn it off for maximum compatibility with reflection or JNI code that manipulates final fields.

removed.name: ShenandoahParallelSafepointThreads
removed.description: Number of parallel threads used for safepoint prolog/epilog

removed.name: ShenandoahStoreCheck
removed.description: Emit additional code that checks objects are written to only in to-space

removed.name: ShenandoahTerminationTrace
removed.description: Tracing task termination timings

removed.name: ShenandoahUpdateRefsEarly
removed.description: Run a separate concurrent reference updating phase afterconcurrent evacuation. Possible values: 'on', 'off', 'adaptive'

removed.name: ShenandoahVerifyObjectEquals
removed.description: Verify that == and != are not used on oops. Only in fastdebug

removed.name: StrictSafepointChecks
removed.description: Enable strict checks that safepoints cannot happen for threads that use NoSafepointVerifier

removed.name: ThreadLocalHandshakes
removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK13
Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15

removed.name: TraceGCTaskQueue

removed.name: TraceNMethodInstalls

removed.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK13
Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15

removed.description: Use CMS best fit allocation strategy

Expired in JDK15

removed.name: UseCMSInitiatingOccupancyOnly
removed.description: Only use occupancy as a criterion for starting a CMS collection

Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15

Obsoleted in JDK14

removed.name: UseGCTaskAffinity

Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK16

removed.name: UseLegacyJNINameEscaping

removed.name: VerifyBlockOffsetArray

removed.name: VerifyOpto
removed.description: Apply more time consuming verification during compilation

removed.name: ZStatisticsForceTrace
removed.description: Force tracing of ZStats

removed.name: ZVerifyLoadBarriers
removed.description: Verify that reference loads are followed by barriers

added.name: AdjustStackSizeForTLS
added.description: Increase the thread stack size to include space for glibc static thread-local storage (TLS) if true

added.name: ArchiveRelocationMode
added.description: (0) first map at preferred address, and if unsuccessful, map at alternative address (default); (1) always map at alternative address; (2) always map at preferred address, and if unsuccessful, do not map the archive

added.name: CompilationMode
added.description: Compilation modes: default: normal tiered compilation; quick-only: C1-only mode; high-only: C2/JVMCI-only mode; high-only-quick-internal: C2/JVMCI-only mode, with JVMCI compiler compiled with C1.

added.name: EnableJVMCIProduct
added.description: Allow JVMCI to be used in product mode. This alters a subset of JVMCI flags to be non-experimental, defaults UseJVMCICompiler and EnableJVMCI to true and defaults UseJVMCINativeLibrary to true if a JVMCI native library is available.

added.name: ShenandoahGCMode
added.description: GC mode to use. Among other things, this defines which barriers are in in use. Possible values are: satb - snapshot-at-the-beginning concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); iu - incremental-update concurrent GC (three pass mark-evac-update); passive - stop the world GC only (either degenerated or full)

added.name: ShenandoahRegionSize
added.description: Static heap region size. Set zero to enable automatic sizing.

added.name: ShenandoahSelfFixing
added.description: Fix references with load reference barrier. Disabling this might degrade performance.

added.name: ShowCodeDetailsInExceptionMessages
added.description: Show exception messages from RuntimeExceptions that contain snippets of the failing code. Disable this to improve privacy.

added.name: Tier0AOTBackEdgeThreshold
added.description: Back edge threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier0AOTCompileThreshold
added.description: Threshold at which to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier0AOTInvocationThreshold
added.description: Switch to interpreter to profile if the number of method invocations crosses this threshold if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier0AOTMinInvocationThreshold
added.description: Minimum number of invocations to switch to interpreter to profile if coming from AOT (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier0Delay
added.description: If C2 queue size grows over this amount per compiler thread do not start profiling in the interpreter (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier40BackEdgeThreshold
added.description: Back edge threshold at which tier 4 OSR compilation is invoked (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier40CompileThreshold
added.description: Threshold at which tier 4 compilation is invoked (invocation minimum must be satisfied, applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier40InvocationThreshold
added.description: Compile if number of method invocations crosses this threshold (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)

added.name: Tier40MinInvocationThreshold
added.description: Minimum number of invocations to compile at tier 4 (applicable only with CompilationMode=high-only|high-only-quick-internal)
